name: findplacesnearby
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool trueway_places.
Tool description: Search for places. Provides detailed information for over 100 million places and points of interest.
API description: Find nearby places based on the given location, language, radius, and type.

location.description: The latitude/longitude around which to retrieve places.

language.description: The language in which to return results. Defaults to 'en'.

radius.description: The distance (in meters) within which to return results. Max = 10000 m. Defaults to 180.

type.description: The type of places that are returned. Defaults to 'cafe'.
